articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Study: NASA Space Strike Might Have Reshaped an Asteroid - VOA Learning English
articles.description: A new study suggests that an asteroid strike by an American spacecraft changed the shape of Dimorphos. Researchers used computer models to recreate the crash. They said the asteroid likely turned into a weak “rubble pile.”
articles.content:
A new study suggests that an asteroid strike by an American spacecraft likely changed the shape of the targeted object.
NASA crashed the DART spacecraft into the asteroid Dimorphos in 2022. The aste… [+3897 chars]

articles.title: Cannabis and Heart Health: A Troubling Connection Uncovered - SciTechDaily
articles.description: More frequent use of cannabis was associated with higher odds of adverse cardiovascular outcomes, finds a new study in the Journal of the American Heart Association. Research Highlights: An analysis of survey data for 430,000 adults in the U.S. found that usi…
articles.content: Cannabis use is associated with higher risks of heart attack and stroke, a study of 430,000 adults indicates, stressing the need for awareness of its cardiovascular effects. Credit: SciTechDaily.com… [+8375 chars]
